back of a length at off stump, defended from the crease
full outside off stump, big stride to drive to mid-off
good length at off stump, defended into the covers
length at off stump. Defended back down the pitch
good length, shape back in. Defended on the front foot, down the pitch
short ball at middle stump, swivels and pulls to deep square off the top of the bat
length at off stump, defended on the front foot
length outside off, punched to point on the up
good length, shaping away from outside off. Left alone
back of a length in the corridor, nips away off the pitch. Beats the outside edge
full and swinging down leg side. Can't get bat on this
length outside off, angled away. Left alone
short and wide outside off. Easy put away. Hangs back and chops it aerially through the covers
short ball at off stump, swivels and shovels, to fine leg
full outside off, leans in and looks to drive through the covers. Gets a big inside edge that dribbles to fine leg's left
back of a length outside off, left alone
full ball at off stump, looks to reverse sweep first up. Struck on the pad, but the appeal is turned down. In fact, it appears to be glove
length at off stump, defended down the pitch
length at off stump, defended on the front foot
back of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot
full at off stump, defended down the pitch
back of a length outside off, poked to deep point off the back foot
full and in at off stump, defended into the off side
short ball outside off, looks to slash through the leg side. It zips through from under his bat
back of a length just outside off, defended into the off side from the crease
short ball outside off. Looks to go across the line again with a pull. Gets well under this and manages to chip it in the square leg area. The fielder running in can't get to that
full at off stump, defended into the covers
lovely. Moves it away very slightly in the corridor. It's full and appears there for the drive, but Perera is beaten on the outside edge
good length, drifting away from off stump. Defended into the covers with soft hands
full toss, floated up at middle stump. Herath waits for it to come on, watches it closely and flicks deftly to the square leg boundary
back of a length at off stump, slight shape away. Clipped to midwicket off the back foot
short and wide outside off. Pulled to midwicket
back of a length, hooping away from off stump. Left alone
short and wide outside off, moving away. Dabs it to deep point's right
full outside off stump, left alone
length at off stump, defended back down the pitch
good length, angling in from outside off stump. Covers the off stump and lets it go
oh gets that woefully wrong. Slams it in halfway, on a leg stump line, and it deviates further down leg side and past Saha's lunge to the right
short ball at off stump, climbs on top of the bounce and gets the front leg up to stylishly whip this between fine leg and deep square
back of a length at off stump, defended into the leg side from the crease
full at off stump, defended into the covers
good length, wide outside off stump. Angles away too. He lets it go
shot! He's clobbered this through midwicket off the back foot. Short ball angling in at the corridor, and he's so quick on his feet to get in position. Stunning hit
short ball outside off, angles in. He gets the bat sufficiently behind his body to let this pass
attempted yorker goes wrong. It shapes back in a touch, but it's a full toss. Herath hurriedly opens the face and squeezes it through the covers
good length at leg stump. Thuds him on the pads as he looks to flick. He makes a ambitious appeal. It's turned down. That pitched outside leg
short ball, wide outside off stump. Left alone
back of a length, moving away in the corridor. Looks to poke off the back foot and is beaten on the outside edge
back of a length in the corridor, defended into the covers
well bowled. Length and in the corridor. Climbs past the outside edge after drawing him forward
back of a length in the corridor, defended off the back foot
back of a length at off stump, lifting away from outside off. Left alone
bouncer tails back at the batsman from a middle stump line, gets him to duck hurriedly. He does it well
good length, swinging in at off stump. Defended solidly on the front foot
back of a length and climbing past off stump. Herath plays inside the line and is nowhere close to getting bat on this
nicely bowled. Length outside off, lunges forward to defend but he's beaten on the outside edge
good length at off stump, opens the face to run the forward block down to deep point
full at leg stump, driven to mid-on off the toe end
back of a length, shaping away from the corridor. Defended off the back foot
good length outside off, shaping away. Left alone
good length and in at leg stump. Flicked to deep square
back of a length outside off, slight nip off the pitch. Looks to play and  then withdraws
good length, swinging in at off stump. Puts a big stride forward and defends down the pitch
back of a length at off stump, run to deep point's left off the outer half of the bat
good length at middle stump, leans in and tucks it past square leg with the angle
short ball slanted across the corridor. Gets on top of it for the pull, but it's too quick for him. Toe-ends it to mid-on's left
good length outside off, poked through point off the front foot
back of a length in the corridor. Shoots up off the pitch and surprises Herath, but he manages to get behind it and drop it into the off side
back of a length on the pads, squeezed to fine leg off the back foot

beauty from Shami! Closest you'll come to the first ball of the Test that got KL Rahul. Back of a length ball, shapes away a touch and tickles the outside edge as the batsman tries hard to get behind the line of this based on it's trajectory. Nicely through to Saha at waist height.
bouncer from around the wicket. Too short. Climbs well above the batsman

well played and sensational work at the boundary from Ravindra Jadeja! What a fielder this guy. This is a short ball that Herath swivels and pulls stylishly towards the midwicket boundary, but little does he know that he's going to have to struggle for the second run. It's bouncing away from Jadeja who's running to his right from deep square. Leaps to to his right and stops it. Picks up and swivels quickly to let rip a flat one that would have had Herath in trouble with a direct hit - which it wasn't by a very small margin
length at middle stump, closes the face and flicks to mid-on on the rise
back of a length outside off, chops it to deep point and settles, very early, for the single
back of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot. Inside half of the bat
back of a length, swinging away from outside off. Gets on the back foot to try and punch it off the back foot. Drags it to mid-off off the bottom of the bat
taken at first slip but there's no edge. It was too far for a shot. Short ball flies wide of off stump and then keeps moving away from Saha. Dhawan takes neatly with a reverse cup
full at middle stump, pushed back at the bowler from the crease
back of a length at middle stump, under-edges the pull to fine leg's right...Lakmal drops his bat as he sets off. Goes back to pick it up and then goes through with the run
back of a length in the corridor, cuts away a long way. He can't get bat on it
back of a length outside off, skews it to deep backward point off the outer half of the bat
back of a length at middle stump, defended into the leg side off the back foot
good length in the corridor, poked into the covers off the back foot

struck on the helmet and the attachment for the back of the head flies off. Lakmal is alright and on his feet. It hit him on the front of the grill as he looked to hook this bouncer from a middle stump line.
bouncer outside off stump, takes on the bouncer again and misses the hook again
well done. Gets bat against this bouncer and clobbers it to the midwicket boundary. No nerves from Lakmal. Takes his eyes off it at the last moment but he's covered this nicely
back of a length outside off, tapped to extra cover off the back foot
there is a guy at deep square leg now, who runs to his left to cut off a very stylish back foot punch from middle stump
length at off stump, skids through straight and defended into the covers off the back foot
length at off stump, defended comfortably on the front foot
tossed up down leg side. He lets it go as it spins down firther
back of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot
floated up at off stump, good length and on off stump. Spins towards leg side. He pads it away. Appeal turned down, it's going down
back of a length at middle stump, defended off the back foot
full and wide outside off. Takes it on with the cover drive and gets a big edge that flies over the slip cordon
back of a length at off stump, flicked to fine leg
nicely bowled. Back of a length in the corridor, zips past the outside edge as he looks to defend on the back foot
leading edge lands short of Umesh. Back of a length delivery angling down leg. He closes the face early on the flick
what a shot. Kevin Pietersen would be proud of that. Short ball at his mid riff. Hangs deep in the crease, swivels on the back foot and whips it stylishly with a slight hint of an aerial front foot
back of a length at off stump, defended on the back foot
back of a length at off stump, pushed to mid-on off the back foot
good length, sliding in towards off stump. Defended on the front foot off the inside half of the bat
good length at middle stump, gets under it as he looks to sweep. Wasn't to the pitch and it becomes a slice in the end. Floats through the square leg region and goes to long leg's right
length outside off, gets behind the line and bat-pads this into the off side
good length, tossed up outside off and bounces a bit. Past Herath's attempted reverse sweep
full at off stump. Pushed through fast. Defended down the pitch
back of a length in the corridor, poked through the open point region
short and wide outside off stump. Nicely timed square drive, but he can't beat point
struck on the back thigh as he looks to clobber this length ball across the line. It was climbing over off stump
back of a length at middle stump, poked to midwicket off the back foot
short and wide outside off, undercuts the back foot slash. Into the point region
full outside off stump, frees his arms and looks to drive through the covers. No feet. No connection
uff he hammers his back at Ashwin. Tossed up outside off. He steps out and strikes hard, along the pitch. Ashwin gets his hands on it but can't stop it entirely. Squeezes from under him for a single
arm ball, back of a length and just missing off stump. Herath was backing away to try and chop it past slip
good length outside off, comes in with the angle again. This time he sweeps and under-edges to deep square. That one was flicked with one finger with the seam up and pointing towards leg stump
good length at off stump, defended on the front foot
sees Lakmal stepping out and fires it in at middle stump. He's forced to push it back down the pitch
floated up at off stump and spinning into the batsman. No feet from him as he looks to flick now. Inside edge onto pad
good length ball, swings away late as he pushes at it outside off. Keeps moving and Saha can't gather cleanly
back of a length in the corridor, climbing up this time and coming into him. He lets it go
well played. Full ball just outside off stump. Opens his body up and then the face of the bat to slice this, slightly uppishly, through cover. Brings up his third fifty
back of a length outside off, cuts away. Left alone
bouncer outside off, too short. Flies above head height, called wide
good length outside off, left alone
back of a length outside off, left alone
good length ball, floated up at leg stump. Spins down leg side considerably. He lets it go
back of a length at off stump, pushed to cover off the back foot
length ball, 78 kph. Loops up outside off. He looks to slog it through midwicket. Gets an inside edge onto pad
back of a length, floater that goes away. Defended on the back foot in front of middle
back of a length at middle stump, defended down the pitch
another one that floats away from off stump. Good length. Defended into the covers
back of a length outside off, poked to extra cover on the up
creams this. What a shot. Short ball outside off stump. Stands still in the crease and whips it to beat Jadeja at deep square
back of a length ball, rises from the surface. Past the outside edge as he looks to dab it past gully
length ball wide outside off, slashes at it and is beaten
back of a length at middle stump, turned to deep square off the back foot
back of a length at off stump, defended into the leg side off the back foot
good length at off stump, no movement on this one. Defended to mid-off
back of a length, nips away from off stump and past the outside edge as the bat comes down for the defence
chips it over midwicket. A length ball ball that was climbing at middle stump. A faux-flamingo from Herath. Didn't connect, but he managed to evade midwicket
back of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot
good length outside off, angles in and straightens in the channel. He's beaten on the outside edge
back of a length at leg stump, clipped through square leg on the up

a lovely pull shot that's straight at Jadeja who is halfway in from the midwicket boundary. It's flat and goes to him on the bounce. He sends Lakmal back and Jadeja throws from the deep at the non-strikers. No one backing up. A good shot gets the reward it deserves
short and wide outside off stump. Reaches out for the cut, can't connect
full outside off, driven to mid-off with the toe-end

top edge as he decides not to play the hook after shaping for it. It's quite high, might probably have been a wide. But the bat was already up and he couldn't get it down in time. Flies over the keeper
good length at off stump, leans in to cover the line and poke this through point
shot. But no run. Length ball outside off stump. No feet but the connection is so good as he punches through the line
good length outside off from around the wicket, cover the off stump and lets it go
clobbered on the up, but straight to extra cover. Length ball outside off with no movement. Hits through the line and finds the fielder

another good looking stroke, but it's sliced straight to deep backward point. This skids on nicely outside off from a length. He gets under it and makes good connection. That fielder has been out for a while though, and he finds him. What an innings from Herath. Yet another Test where he changes the narrative on the fourth day - and he hasn't even had a bowl today
good length, slanted in at middle stump. Defended into the leg side
good length at off stump, defended on the front foot
full at off stump. Dug out into the off side watchfully
outside edge zooms through backward point. It's an overpitched ball outside off. No feet. Only one thing on his mind - hit this hard. Doesn't quite get it, but it's four anyway
full at off stump. Looks to crunch it through cover again. Gets it to mid-on instead, off the inside half
short ball outside off skids through as he shapes to pull. Sliced towards mid-off, but well short of that fielder

chops it on. Length ball wide outside off. Goes after it with no feet. Hard hands. Once again, not subtle about what Sri Lanka are going for. But the new ball skids on and he can't hit through the line. Big inside edge onto the stumps. He's done his part. 16 runs and part of a 46-run stand for the ninth
good length at off stump, no movement. Defended solidly into the leg side
back of a length outside off stump, bit of shape away. Left alone
back of a length, shaping away from outside off. Left alone
back of a length, moving away from off stump. But he's behind it this time and it's comfortably pushed into the off side for India's first run
full ball, swinging down leg side. Looks to flick but it's too far away
back of a length at middle stump, defended off the back foot
back of a length outside off, angled in but skids straight through off the pitch. Plays with no feet, inside the line. Beaten on the outside edge
classy. Overpitched outside off, maintains his balance and gets the timing perfect as he drives this right off the middle and through extra cover
shot. Beautiful. Good length, just outside off stump. No need for a stride again. Stands tall and offers the full face to punch it past mid-off
back of a length outside off, defended to point off the back foot
back of a length outside off, covers the off stump and lets it go
beautiful. Very stylish from Rahul. Three in the V. Another overpitched ball, again he's to the pitch early and is nicely balanced as he drives to mid-off's left
back of a length, wide outside off. Left alone
nicely timed. Leans in and drives on the up to this length ball outside off. Can't beat mid-off who dives to his right
back of a length, wide outside off. Left alone
back of a length outside off, angling in at the corridor. Leaves it alone
poked through the covers. Good length, wide outside off. Good stride in and then just a jab to send this to the boundary
back of a length at off stump. No room this time. Defended into the off side
good length outside off, leans in and opens the face to control the outside edge. It drops in front of second slip
back of a length in the corridor. Poked through point off the back foot
full and wide outside off, leaves it alone
back of a length at off stump, defended to gully off the outside half
oh geez. Poor ball. Short ball just outside off. Dhawan happy to stay put and drag this to the midwicket boundary with a pull. It's off the lower part of the bat, but it races away
good length at off stump, defended off the back foot
back of a length outside off. Keeps low as he presses onto the back foot and pokes away from the body. Under-edges into the pitch
length ball, looping in at off stump. Walks at it and skews it to fine leg off the inside half of the bat
back of a length just outside off, left alone
short ball, slanted across off stump. Left alone
back of a length at off stump. Squeezes it off the back foot towards cover. He misfields, but mid-off is backing up
back of a length at middle stump. Looks to flick. Inside edge onto thigh guard and it rolls pitchside
good length outside off, leans in and opens the face to steer it to point
back of a length, angled across the corridor. Some bounce there. He leaves it alone
good length at off stump, defended into the covers
good length at off stump, solidly defended down the pitch
short and just outside off. Chopped to deep point
anticipates the line and shuffles a long way to get behind this length ball. Defends into the off side
full and wide outside off. Bait not taken. Left alone
full outside off. A nervous push away from the body on the front foot. Gets an inside edge that rolls into the leg side
steps out, and punches on the up. Length ball at off stump it was. Finds extra cover on the bounce
length at off stump, defended on the front foot
back of a length outside off, stands tall as he punches regally off the back foot. Sweeper cleans up to his left
back of a length in the corridor, defended to gully with soft hands
good length at off stump, defended on the front foot
good length, just outside off. Left alone
nicely played. They got deep point in, put two catching covers and asked him to try. He succeeded. Shuffles and leans into this and opens the face to drive through cover point
good length at off stump. Watchfully defended under his eyes
back of a length just outside off. Big shuffles into the off side again. Leaves it alone
overpitched, just outside off stump. Driven straight to extra cover on the bounce
good length outside off stump, left alone
gives him the charge and drives this length ball to mid-off. Calls early for the single
length outside off, tapped on the up to extra cover
good length outside off, beaten on the outside edge as he stretches forward
good length outside off. Shuffles a long way and shoulders arms to one that comes in. Not out says the umpire. They won't review
back of a length in the corridor, defended off the back foot
back of a length at off stump. Opens the face to steer to deep point
overpitched outside off. Goes hard at the drive but miscues it. Trickles out to mid-off
short ball outside off, worked to deep point off the back foot
good length at off stump, driven on the up to extra cover
back of a length, slanting across the channel. Left alone
back of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot
back of a length and shoots back in at knee height from outside off. He's on the back foot. Inside edge onto pad and a single through point
length at middle stump, flicked straight to midwicket
good length outside off, leans into the tap on the front foot. Beats cover's dive, can't beat sweeper's sprint
length at off stump, defended off the back foot
gives the charge, meets the length ball outside off and punches it past the non-striker and mid-off
back of a length outside off, left alone
drops a tough return catch. Length at off stump. Punched back hard at him. It's low to his right and he can barely get the right hand out at it as he falls into the off side in his follow through
back of a length in the corridor, left alone
good length at off stump. Squeeze to deep square off the inside half of the bat
good length just outside off, punched to mid-off on the up
glorious. Overpitched outside off, short stride to meet it at the pitch and crunched through the covers
good length outside off, punched to mid-off on the up
good length outside off, pushes on the front foot and opens the face to steer through point
good length outside off, nice looking cover drive on the up but it is stopped by extra cover with a dive to his right
bouncer. Too short. Floats above the head and is called wide
good length outside off. Walks into the drive and is too early on it. Drags it wide of mid-on off the inside half of the bat
good length at off stump, poked into the covers on the front foot
short ball outside off, left alone
back of  a length slider outside off, plays late and gets it past slip with an open face
good length outside off. Goes straight on after it drifts away. Left alone
back of a length at off stump, punched to the bowler off the back foot
full outside off, pushed to extra cover on the front foot
back of a length outside off, defends with soft hands and that means he nearly plays it on. Not helped by an awkward leg which acts as a slide towards the stumps
back of a length outside off, tapped through point off the back foot
length outside off. Walks at it and adjust late for the cut away. Pushes it to second slip's right
length outside off, driven on the up, straight to extra cover
back of a length outside off, chopped to deep point
short ball outside off, left alone
back of a length outside off, left alone
good length, in at middle stump. Pushes towards mid-on with soft hands and steals a single
good length at middle stump, driven to long-on off the front foot

a review for catch at short leg. Perera skids it into leg stump from a length. Dhawan is looking to flick and cops it on the pad. Not given out. Lobbed to short leg. There seemed to be two sounds, but one of them was probably bat hitting pad. The ball is nowhere near bat on the replay and tracking shows he won't be lbw either. Decision stands
length outside off, steps out and jams it out to extra cover
back of a length at middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
full and flat, in at leg stump. Flicked to long-on's left
full outside off, leans in to push to sweeper cover
back of a length at middle stump, pushed to mid-on from the crease
good length, angled in at the pad. Can't get bat on the flick. Cops it on the front pad
length outside off stump, leans into it, gets the hands through the line of it and punches to the extra cover fence
bouncer outside off stump, dug too short and he lets it go
back of a length, wide outside off. Left alone
back of a length in the corridor, angled in. He plays inside the line to let this go
floated half-volley outside off, gets to the pitch with little fuss and drives through the covers
full at off stump, defended on the front foot
good length at middle stump, defended on the front foot
full at off stump, steps out and drives straight to extra cover
full at middle stump, pushed back down the pitch
good length outside off, tapped through point off the front foot
short and wide outside off. Looks to slap this one the up but it sails through from under his bat
back of a length in the corridor, defended off the back foot
gorgeous. Good length outside off stump, leans in and is not to the pitch, so he has to use his wrists to adjust. Slightly aerial, but he's picked the gap between the two fielders catching at cover

inside edge and four down to fine leg. No clue with this one, Rahul. It dips back at him and he's playing for the one straight outside off. No feet at all. Massive gap between bat and pad, but this misses leg stump
back of a length in the corridor, climbs as he lets it go
back of a length outside off stump, left alone
length ball at middle stump. Steps out, doesn't make it to the pitch. Pushes it down the pitch with bat and pad close
length at middle stump, steps out and flicks to deep square
good length at off stump, defended on the front foot
back of a length at middle stump, stands deep in the crease and nurdles it through midwicket to bring up his 9th fifty in 11 Test innings
full at leg stump, driven to long-on
oh so good. Length ball outside off. He's quickly down the track to meet it at the pitch and drive it firmly to cover's right
full at off stump, short stride to drive straight to mid-off
back of a length outside off, climbs on him as he stretches forward. Opens the face to adjust and just manages to beat gully
back of a length, outside off stump and angling in. Left alone
back of a length outside off, left alone
back of a length outside off, nips away off the surface. Left alone
back of a length at leg stump, poked on the up through midwicket
good length outside off, defended on the front foot

Dhawan gets down for the sweep and can't get it off the middle. Struck in front of the stumps. The lbw appeal is turned down. Perera suggests the ball has straightened. Remember, he's bowling around the wicket. He has managed to convince Chandimal to take the review. But Ultra Edge suggests there is glove on it. Decision stands.
full at middle stump, driven to long-on
back of a length at middle stump, defended off the back foot
back of a length at middle, defended off the back foot
short ball sliding outside off. Under-edges through point on the attempted cut
length outside off, pushed to mid-off
length outside off, defended square on the side
back of a length and angling in from outside off. Left alone
bouncer at off stump, sways away to let it pass
well bowled. Back of a length outside off. Doesn't come back in with the angle and beats the outside edge as he looks to defend away from the body
good length outside off, poked through point off the front foot
short ball outside off. Gets back and cuts to deep point
good length outside off, steps out and drives to extra cover
good length at leg stump. Cops it on the thigh guard as he looks to flick
length at off stump, steps out and defends back at the bowler
goes back for the glance and cops another length ball on the thigh guard
length at middle stump, plants the front leg forward and flicks to deep square
good length at middle stump, flicked to deep square
length outside off, tapped to extra cover on the up
length at off stump. Shuffles and adjusts his wrists to poke this wide of mid-on
back of a length outside off, pushed to sweeper cover off the back foot
back of a length outside off. Left alone
length at off stump, pushed to mid-on from the crease
drops it short outside off. Chopped past point. Easy put away for Dhawan
back of a length at middle stump, defended off the back foot
length at off stump, steps out and drives to long-off
back of a length at middle stump, clipped to deep midwicket off the back foot
length at leg stump. Steps out and flicks to deep midwicket as the crowd bursts out in cheer. That's his fifty
good length at off stump, defended on the front foot
tossed up outside off, squeezed into the off side after yorking himself
length at off stump, driven to long-on after he steps down
length ball, skids straight on as he defends for the spin. Big gap between bat and pad. Big inside edge through square leg
length at middle stump, flicked to midwicket
shot! Length ball outside off. Steps out and makes room this time, before hammering this over mid-off
length at off, steps out and drives straight to extra cover
back of a length outside off, punched to extra cover off the back foot
short ball outside off. He shapes to cut but resists the temptation late. Leaves it alone
length and angling in at off stump. Looks to force it through the off side on the front foot. Gets it out to mid-on off the inside half
back of a length in the corridor. No room for either the cut or the pull. Respectfully defends into the off side
back of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot
back of a length in the corridor, hops to get on top of the bounce and punch to sweeper cover
full at middle stump. Pushed through flat. He stays in his crease and pushes to midwicket
good length at off stump, defended on the front foot
length at off stump. Steps out and drives to long-off
good length at middle stump, steps out, drives to long-on
length at off stump. Steps out and pokes to extra cover. Was beaten in flight there
smash! What a way to bring up the lead. This is length at middle stump. Dhawan skips down the track confidently and hammers it over long-on
bouncer outside off. Climbs sharply above his attempted hook shot
good length at off stump, pushed through the covers on the up
back of a length outside off. Keeps low as he defends off the back foot
back of a length at leg stump, flicked to deep square
short ball outside off. Ducks and sways before deciding to fish for it and ramp over slip. Beaten
full and just outside off. Defended to cover on the front foot
back of a length outside off, left alone
good length at middle stump, gets down and ramps this to long leg's left
length at leg stump. A more conventional shot this time. Full blooded sweep. Straight to long leg
full at off stump, pushed to cover on the front foot
length outside off, pushed through flat. Poked to sweeper cover
slots it over the midwicket boundary. Length ball, pushed through flat outside off. Dhawan gets under it and nails the slog sweep
length at off stump, steps out and squeezes it down to long-off
back of a length in the channel, opens the face and casually bunts this to deep point's right
good bouncer. Angles in at the helmet and his bat and gloves are still up as he decides to leave this. Was hurried. Lucky to not get contact on that
back of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover off the back foot
yorker outside off. Squeezed through point off the front foot
short ball at the ribs, swivels as he gets on top of the bounce and rolls the wrists to pull this to deep square's left
another bouncer goes wrong. it's down leg side, it's not climbing. He swivels and places it fine this time, to fine leg's left
short ball outside off, backs away and cuts to deep point
back of a length at off stump, pushed to extra cover's right
length at off stump, defended on the front foot
back of a length at off stump, defended on the front foot
length at middle stump, shovelled from the crease to deep midwicket
good length outside off, leans into the drive, finds sweeper cover
back of a length outside off, checked punch to extra cover off the back foot
good length outside off, steps out and pushes to mid-off to steal a single
beaten. Length ball wide outside off. Leans in to it and pushes feebly
short ball wide outside off, looks to cut, beaten again
good length, wide outside off. Left alone
length outside off, steps out and pushes defensively into the off side
back of a length outside off, pushed to point off the back foot
length, and sliding into the pad. Can't get bat on the flick
length outside off, defended on the front foot
back of a length at off stump, squeezed to point off the back foot
length outside off, defended on the front foot
full and wide outside off, flowing drive to sweeper cover
good length, at leg stump. He's showing leg stump as he looks to flick this and cops it on the pad. But that was pitching outside and the appeal suggests he knows that
back of a length at off stump, punched to sweeper cover
bouncer, bowled too short. Gets under it comfortably
bouncer at middle stump. A loose attempt at a hook shot, without any attempt to get on top of the bounce
back of a length outside off, tapped to extra cover off the back foot
good length at middle stump, gets down for the sweep and keeps it along the floor as he places it to long leg
good length at off stump, defended on the front foot
length outside off, steps out and drives to long-off
back of a length at off stump, tapped back down the pitch
good length, sliding across off stump. Pushed to deep point with the angle
length at leg stump, flicked to long leg

appeal for caught behind and Nigel Llong has given it. Dhawan reviews straight away. Bowler hadn't even appealed. Dhawan had stepped out and tried to drive this length ball outside off. It nipped back in and just missed the off stump....Ultra Edge shows a spike. He's gone. Great innings, and narrowly misses out on the hundred
length outside off, left alone
full and down leg side, too far away for the flick. Dickwella leaps to his left to stop it
good length, swinging away from outside off. Left alone
full and swinging away, wide outside off stump. Left alone
back of a length in the corridor, defended off the back foot
back of a length, darting away outside off. Left alone
good length outside off, steered to deep point with an open face
back of a length at the pads, flicked to deep square
well left. Short ball climbs in at him, off and middle line. Arches backwards to let it pass
short ball outside off, left alone
bouncer outside off, left alone
back of a length, in at middle stump. Flicked to fine leg
full outside off. Leans in to caress it through the covers. Herath runs to his right at deep point and puts in the slide
a neat little clip through midwicket
a little more bounce which Pujara is happy enough to capitalise on. A shortish delivery at the body is nudged to long leg
back of a length and outside off, Rahul taps it in front of cover
an absolute tease of a ball, so wide outside off. Rahul reaches for it, and even then only bottom edges it to deep cover
sweet timing from Rahul as he opens the face and glides the ball to the sweeper
a touch of seam movement away from the right-hander, who reads the line of the ball early and lets it go outside off
gorgeous straight drive. The bowler does his best to pitch the ball up to the new batsman. But it ends up a half-volley and Pujara tucks into it
good length ball outside off, no shot

big appeal for lbw as Lakmal coaxes a good length ball to dart into Pujara. The batsman isn't in the very best of positions to handle such late movement - entirely off the pitch - with the bat coming down across the line of the ball. The bounce probably saves him
back of a length and outside off, lets it go
fullish and outside off, Rahul isn't tempted into flapping at those
firm push through extra cover, the bat face quite pristine, the front foot striding confidently towards the line of a perfectly good length ball
packs a proper punch through cover! For a change, Pujara's backlift goes fairly high and it comes down with malice against a shortish ball outside off.
punishes the fuller delivery now, past the left of short cover, and his timing takes care of the rest
raps him on the thigh pad, with Pujara attempted to flick the ball through midwicket. Odd that he'd muck up a bread-and-butter shot
good length ball, a shade outside off, blocks
a little nip in off the track, but Pujara handles it well enough.
the awayswinger, attempted to lure Pujara into an on-the-up drive. No luck
turns a back of a length delivery on off stump through midwicket
full and outside off, pushes through cover
back of a length and outside off, Pujara shows it scant interest
he's brought forward by a fuller length in line with fifth stump, but the ball darts in off the deck and pins Rahul's gloves even
leans into a pristine cover drive
looks to drive on the up - eschewed those shots in the first innings - but still keeps that straight face intact
hard-handed block to a fuller delivery outside off. Pujara's definitely come out looking to take the game on
nails the half-volley outside off to short cover
defends a shortish delivery a shade outside off
oooh, nearly squares him up and it's only his decision to yank that errant front foot back and present soft hands to a full delivery angled in and shaping away that he is able to block

through him! Late on the flick against an indipper. But in his defence the ball starts snaking back in rather late. It begins as the kind of delivery - full and on off stump - a batsman would love to clip through midwicket. Half a second later it bursts through the bat and pad gap and nails middle stump. A longer stride and a straighter bat might have helped there. Instead, Rahul was pushing at the ball, reaching in front of his body, throwing his balance off.
bouncer outside off, ignores it
good length and wide outside off, Kohli leaves it again
beaten as he is drawn into playing at a very wide delivery outside off
shuffles onto off stump and works a full delivery to midwicket
defends a shortish delivery on off stump
steps forward to meet the full delivery outside off
bangs it in short, the line wide outside off. Pujara spurns the offering
blunts a back of a length delivery on off stump
leans into the drive to mid-off
good length and outside off, Pujara has gone back to steadfastly ignoring them
past the wicketkeeper! He's off the pair! Sri Lanka are trying to pepper Kohli with short ones, but the batsman hops up to get on top of the bounce and gloves it to Dickwella's left
thrusts his hands at a good length ball outside off, and a little bit of seam away takes the outside edge to point
yanks a length ball from outside off to drill it down the ground between the stumps and the non-striker. Bottom-hand dominance
bangs it in short and outside off, Pujara drops his wrists
the follow-up ball is full and drivable. Pujara knows the threat it poses and leaves it outside off
short of a good length outside off, Pujara doesn't care for it
has to get up off his toes to slice a short ball outside off to cover
walks at the fast bowler, the movement taking him outside off. Lakmal spots it and makes sure his bouncer soars over the batsman
good length outside off, firm push to mid-off

the front foot is too far across, playing the line of the ball outside off, before it darts back in. Kohli adjusts with his hands, jabbing down at the ball that is cramping him badly. Pujara realises the inside edge could still fetch a single
fuller delivery outside off, Pujara defends
shortish and outside off, Pujara covers the stumps and doesn't do much beyond that
ripper! It's odd that Kohli is striding forward to a ball that is short enough to stay back to.Then it hits the deck and rears past the outside edge

he's across on off stump to try and open up the leg side with his bottom hand. But Lakmal does well, getting movement off the pitch. Pins him on the pads, attempts even an lbw appeal, but there is an inside edge
fuller delivery, seaming away, Pujara leaves it wisely
targets off stump, from wide of the crease, hoping for the ball to straighten. It certainly does, but not quite to the extent that it would beat Pujara's bat
outside edge as he tries to bring his bat in line with a good length ball on off stump, seaming away at the last instant
defends a shortish delivery on off stump
rocks back, plays late, opens the face and guides a short ball only a shade outside off through point. Lovely work
drops his wrists against a short ball outside off and then his face falls because he realises he could have pulled it through midwicket. Overestimates the bounce
walks at the seamer, wandering outside off, but now he's miffed by a bit of extra bounce. Kohli's flick through midwicket is mistimed as the ball hits very high on the bat
digs it in short and outside off, lets it go
decks in off the pitch, but Pujara, by virtue of playing late, makes the movement work for him. Flicks to deep backward square leg
full on off stump, Kohli gives it the full face
full on middle and leg, Pujara is at pains to play straight to mid-on and not across the line through midwicket
beaten, playing inside the line of a good length ball that juuuuust holds its line against the angle.

does him in again. Lovely bowling from Lakmal, pitching it full to lure Pujara forward, lining it up just outside off, so he has to play and then conjures some seam movement to make sure to beat the outside edge
outside edge as Pujara plays late and keeps the bat face down to find a single through point
full and outside off, no need to play those
works a shortish delivery from outside off into midwicket
he's on the cover drive a bit too early and misses out on a boundary. Tame delivery, wide outside off, wanders back into Gamage's hands
back of a length and outside off, lets it go
presses forward outside off and guides a good length ball through point
big swing into the right-hander, but Pujara's ability to hold his stance and commit to a shot as late as possible, helps him get a single through midwicket
short and outside off, drops his wrists
short ball on off stump, blocks it
guides a shortish delivery a shade outside off to the right of gully. Plays close to the body, as he needs to, considering Lakmal's seam movement

sensational catch, and a sensational ball! So much bounce on this short ball. And it surprises Pujara to no end. One moment, he is shifting his weight back to block, and he seems to have covered for all possibilities. Except the freakish one, like the ball holding its line and soaring off the shoulder of the bat to gully. The third umpire is brought in to check whether Dilruwan has taken it cleanly. And replays suggest he has. Great work, running forwards, diving headlong at the ball, as if he was diving off a springboard into a swimming pool
bouncer, on leg stump, lets it go
another rising delivery, which pitches on off stump and holds its line. Rahane has to get up on his toes to blunt it
back of a length and outside off, lets it go

gives it lbw but Rahane has reviewed. Brilliant bowling from Lakmal. Pitches it up, gets it to snake in off the pitch and the new batsman, stuck on the crease, is playing all around it. No bat confirms Ultra-Edge. And ball-tracking suggests this would clip the leg bail. Umpire Wilson's call is upheld, even with Rahane up on his toes and the impact above his knee roll
good length ball outside off, ignores it
bouncer outside off, Kohli pulls his guns back
blocks a shortish delivery outside off
fuller delivery outside off, Kohli slices it behind point
back of a length, slanting it across the left-hander from over the wicket. Jadeja lets it go
short and on the pads, Jadeja shuffles across and works it to deep square leg

appeal for lbw, not given this time. He keeps on testing em. Making the new batsman play. Extracting movement from a pitch we all thought has flattened out. This pitches on a good length on off stump. Nips back in just enough. And Jadeja, caught in the crease, playing across the line, is struck too high
good length, outside off, ignores it
digs it in, angles it across the left-hander, who drops his wrists
blocks a back of a length delivery pitching outside off and coming into him at the last minute
pitches it up, teasing Jadeja into driving on the up. But he restrains himself well. That will be drinks
pulls a short ball from outside off to deep square leg. Powerful hit
digs it in short and angles it at the body, going around the wicket. Jadeja gets inside the line and shoulders arms
fishes for a back of a length delivery outside off and is surprised by both extra bounce and a little bit of seam away
shortish on middle, clips it to mid-on
blocks, gingerly, the short of a good length delivery outside off
gets up on his toes to defuse a short ball on middle and off down to long leg
short ball first up, which Jadeja pulls to deep midwicket
blocks a short of a length delivery outside off

past short cover - and it is in the air too. Samarawickrama is the fielder, diving to his left, but the ball bounces just short of him and skips past to the boundary. Kohli times the cover drive well enough despite being pulled into the shot wayyyy to early
digs it in way too short to interest the batsman. The umpire is brought into play though
walks across outside off and clips a shortish delivery through midwicket
tries to flick the back of a length delivery on leg stump. But it slips past him. Sri Lanka go up for a caught behind, but there really isn't anything on it. Not even thigh pad
turns a back of a length delivery to midwicket
good length, outside off, no shot
full and outside off, Kohli isn't sucked in by its charms
pushes a fuller delivery outside off to cover. A punch as opposed to a drive, which remains dangerous
doesn't really have the room to pull, so he doesn't go full-blooded at the shot. Swivels on the back foot, lets the ball hit the bat and guides it away
fullish and just a shade outside off, Jadeja defends
defends a good length ball to the right of short cover
works a full delivery off his pads to long leg. Jadeja wants two, Kohli yells 'noooo'

falls short of gully. Kohli is lured into flashing at a very wide delivery outside off and the outside edge slips past the fielder. Lakmal on the boundary misfields to give a second run. He looks quite stiff, not able to bend down to the ball
fullish and outside off, defends
leading edge as he walks out, and across his stumps, to hit the ball through midwicket. Shanaka getting the ball to seam away like a legbreak helps him get out of jail
good length and outside off, no shot
back of a length hand outside off, lets it go

good short ball! Summoning that in his 10th over of the day is certainly laudable. Gets Jadeja off his toes and the line being on off stump, the angle from around the wicket, forces him to fend the ball away to avoid bodily harm
defends a good length ball on off stump
plays close to the body as he gets a front foot stride going. Good length ball on off stump sent to mid-off
bouncer, angled in on leg stump, Jadeja lets it fly through to the wicketkeeper
back of a length on off stump, Jadeja minds the ball straightening and defends with soft hands
pitches it up outside off, Jadeja is into his drive a bit early and it skews off the inside half of the bat to mid-off
whips a full delivery from outside off to wide mid-on
swivels on the back foot and pulls the short ball stylishly to deep midwicket
fuller delivery, from over the wicket now. Jadeja leaves it outside off
good length, outside off, Jadeja shuffles across, protects his stumps and then leaves
shortish and outside off, no shot
too wide outside off to interest Jadeja
blocks a shortish delivery outside off to cover. Gamage into his 11th over of the morning
slaps a short ball to the point boundary, past the right of the man on the boundary. Gamage gives the width and the Indian captain climbs onto it
corrects his line, and Kohli is expecting it. Shuffling across, he flicks a full delivery on off stump to deep midwicket
bangs it into the deck and the bouncer soars high over Jadeja's head. Around the wicket, into the body from the workhorse
fullish, and a shade outside off, Jadeja, stuck in the crease, defends to gully
gets forward to a fuller delivery looking for the top of off stump and pins it down
drills it to the long-on boundary. A touch too full, but not really a half-volley. So Kohli has to keep his balance and he does that so well. Shanaka's limited-pace is hampering him
slides down leg and Kohli can't connect with a leg glance
gets a lot closer to the pitch of a fuller delivery outside off and drives to the left of mid-off
back of a length, with just enough cut back into the left-hander, makes Jadeja mistime his attempted punch through point
full and outside off, Jadeja lets it go.

blocks a shortish delivery on off stump. Playing really well is Jadeja. Came in with Sri Lanka on top, has been lucky that he hasn't had to face their best bowler, but his defensive technique has been spot on
loops it up outside off, Kohli bottom-hand whips it back to the bowler. A helicopter shot all along the ground
works a tossed up delivery to midwicket
hangs back and lets the shortish delivery almost pass him before cutting it towards the third man boundary
goes back to block a good length ball outside off
low full toss, which Kohli drives to long-on

with practically everyone on the boundary, Jadeja still finds it with his streetsmarts. Leans over the tossed up ball angled into leg stump from around the wicket and turns it ever so fine to the long leg boundary.
good length ball makes Kohli reach out way past his off stump and nick it to gully
lovely looking drive from Kohli, but Shanaka dives to his right and possibly stops a boundary. Compensates well for bowling it too full
gets forward to block a fullish delivery outside off
back of a length and outside off, lets it go
full and outside off, smokes it to deep cover
back of a length and outside off, Jadeja does what he does, pulling out a cheeky glide to third man, trying to cut the gap between the slips and gully. Can't pull it off
tosses it up outside off, Kohli moves forward and across so that he can roll his wrists over the ball and send it to long-on
loops it up outside off, Jadeja punches it to short cover, who dives to his right and does really well to stop a run
backs away to cut a shortish delivery and finds point. Lovely footwork
the slider, going on with the arm from around the wicket. Jadeja comes forward and gets an inside edge past short leg

extra bounce! Jadeja is furious to go that way, done in by the pitch. He responds to the length of the ball, shortish, by going back, and the line, on off stump, to play a defensive push towards cover. The only problem is it rears up shaaaaarply. Gets a thick edge, that lobs off the wicketkeeper's gloves and lands in Thirimanne's hands as he dives forward at first slip
tosses it up and gets it to drift outside off, Ashwin smothers the turn as he drives down the pitch
back of a length and outside off, ignores it
gets up tall to blunt the shortish delivery outside off to gully.

fuller delivery outside off, defends to point. Dilruwan runs across from gully and misfields. Gets down with one hand, doesn't collect, and then ends up kicking it away. Lakmal is exasperated, he wanted to have a crack at the new batsman
bouncer, on middle and leg, Kohli lets it go and then practices hooking the ball
full and outside off, lets it go
tosses it up outside off, Ashwin lunges forward to block
lets go a tossed up ball drifting away outside off
plants his bat in front of pad as he blocks a flighted delivery which holds its line on off stump
drives fluently to mid-off
opens the face and the drive finds cover this time. Dilruwan giving it lots of air

beaten by a ball that goes straight on! Looks to drive a ball that isn't really full enough. He's expecting it to turn as well, but Dilruwan primarily tests the outside edge with his drift and the trick very nearly works
back of a length and outside off, no shot
back of a length and outside off, lets it go
fullish and outside off, Kohli stays patient and his bat stays away
good length, seaming away from wide outside off. Kohli lunges forward and lets it go
bouncer on middle and leg, Kohli ducks
good length a shade outside off, Kohli defends with his head right over the ball and that is lunch
capably defends the fuller delivery on middle.
presses forward to a pitched up delivery outside off and shoulders arms
plants an open face down on a wide delivery outside off and manages to pierce the gap between the two slips and the gully. Very intentional, if a bit risky
punches a back of a length delivery on the up to deep point

gets behind a pitched up delivery on and around off stump. Concentrating hard is Kohli. Barring an innings in Rajkot, I cant remember too many Tests where he's been pressed to show the skills to bat out a draw
good length and outside off, Kohli shows it absolutely no love
gets up with the rising delivery on leg stump and glances it fine to long leg
rather slow, very wide, Kohli refuses to play and then practices a cut shot as if he needs that little bit of release to keep playing defensively
defends a fullish delivery angled into off stump
back of a length on off stump, blocks with soft hands in search of a single to cover, but Ashwin says no
picks up the short ball outside off early enough that he can pull it straight of even midwicket
kicks up and beats him. Ashwin is pressing forward in search of a good length ball outside off, but it hits the seam and darts away into the keeper's gloves
between the slip and gully. Kohli is drawn into flashing at a very wide delivery but somehow profits from a drive away from his body
lunges forward, but also across to get closer to the fuller delivery outside off, and then drives through cover
back of a length and outside off, Ashwin lets it go
defends a back of a length delivery on off stump
an airy-fairy drive to a ball that isn't really full enough for such shenanigans produces an inside edge through to fine leg. Lapse in concentration from Ashwin

tails into the right-hander, and though it is still on off stump, it plays into Kohli's strengths. He shuffles across, gets his head on top of the ball and flicks the ball to the fine leg boundary. That's his first Test fifty at the Eden
clips a shortish delivery on off stump to mid-on
shortish and outside off, Ashwin reverts back to leaving them
good length ball outside off, no shot

beauty! He has constantly been pitching it there and thereaboubts, making sure the seam is upright and giving the ball every chance to misbehave. Good length ball draws Ashwin forward and zooms past the outside edge
squares him up with a full delivery that holds its line on off stump
rises with the short ball outside off and drops it down by his feet
fuller delivery on off stump, knocks it down in stately fashion
looks to drive a full delivery outside off, but by getting into the shot a bit too early, his bat face turns on impact and goes to mid-on
shortish on off stump, defends
good bouncer! It cuts in off the deck and forces Ashwin to take evasive action. Sways away and drops his wrists as the ball flies over middle and off stump

through the gate! A hint of movement, off a sizeable crack, to dance past the inside edge and clatter into the stumps. Ashwin's habit of driving balls on the up topples him again and its excellent bowling from the allrounder - pitching it up and outside off - to bring that weakness into play
good length ball outside off, creeps along to the wicketkeeper.
tossed up on middle and off, Kohli drives into the covers
angles it into off stump and Kohli drills it to long-off
loops it a shade outside off - the pace a lot slower against the new batsman. Saha defends with low hands
good length ball on off stump, blocks
waits on the fuller delivery to arrive on his pads and then rolls his wrists on top of it to put the short leg fielder out of play
plonks the bat in front of pad to defend a good length ball in line with the stumps
the 39-year old Herath dives to his left to stop a certain boundary to long-on. Kohli steps out of his crease for a whippy drive
back of a length and outside off, defends
lunges forward again to smack a fuller delivery outside off through cover
bangs it in and Saha gets under the bouncer on leg stump
good length ball, seaming away off the pitch, Saha lets it go
fullish and outside off, Saha lets it go and the ball wobbling away from the wicketkeeper makes him fumble
loads of air on this ball angled into off stump, Saha blocks
pulls his front leg away from the loopy delivery on leg stump and drives to mid-on
comes forward to smother the turn on a flighted delivery on off stump
blunts a slow, tossed up delivery on middle
rolls his wrists over the ball to make sure it stays down. Clever Herath gets the ball to dip just enough
drives a fuller delivery on middle back down the pitch
floats a back of length ball around off stump, not much movement off the pitch, defended solidly
gets a good stride forward and drives this to sweeper cover
bounce off the length area, Saha strides forward to defend but is forced to withdraw his bottom hand as he jabs at that, rolls off a thick inside edge to the leg side
firm push, Kohli takes off for the single in a jiffy even as mid-off swooped in to fire a throw at the bowler's end
there's width outside off, but there's bounce as well. Saha drops his gloves and watches this zip through to the keeper

once again uncertain forward push, gets an inside edge towards square leg. Herath had to run to his right from midwicket and he was very slow to move. Saha called for two and Kohli blindly trusted him to complete it easily
nice flight, lands this on off, defended back to the bowler
gets right to the pitch of the ball as he smears this drive to sweeper cover
lunges forward and smothers the spin nicely
drifting into middle and leg from around the stumps, Saha plays a neat little vertical bat paddle past short fine leg.
steps out and drives with the spin to Chandimal at cover
gets the bat well in front of the pad as he keeps out this full delivery
dabs it gently towards point and scampers a single
watches this length ball slide through to the keeper, kept a touch low as well

got him! Saha has driven this on the up to cover. This when the need of the hour was to bat for time. Good, low catch by Sadeera. The ball bobbled from his right hand onto the left as he bent forward to take it. As for the shot selection, well, you've to question the timing. This was by no means a half-volley, and driving on the up on a surface where there's some nibble away caused his downfall. India are by no means safe just yet
ducks under this bouncer, way over Bhuvneshwar's head
pokes and misses, This full delivery nipped away off he seam as Bhuvi prodded forward half-heartedly
much fuller and just outside off, driven straight to cover

thick edge to the third man boundary. Lakmal shouldn't complain. Just short of length but this one swerves away just a wee bit to square Kohli up as he pushes away from the body. The good thing from Kohli's point of view is he didn't jab at it
and again, but this time there's third man. Kohli is well forward as he opens the bat face to steer this down. Once again, played it with soft hands
back of length on off stump, defended solidly to cover
beauty. Angles in a length ball that pitches outside off and holds its line, Bhuvi plays inside the line of the ball as it whizzes through
just missed the edge by a whisker. Stunning from Lakmal. Once again that uncomfortable length. Full and just around off stump, Bhuvneshwar pokes without any clue of what the ball will do.
this time he's right behind the line of this full-length delivery as he keeps it out

gorgeous! By no means a half-volley this but that stride forward does the trick for Kohli as he transfers his weight forward to lean into the drive and essay a classic. Terrific balance, head right on top of the ball
defends tentatively as the ball bounces a couple of times behind the wicket, nowhere near the stumps though
full and shaping away from outside off, Kohli watches this through to the keeper
well forward again as he defends this full-length delivery
bounce this time, hits one spot ahead of length on middle and kicks off. Kohli loosens his grip to defend as the ball hits the top part of the bat
gentle little push into the gap at short cover for a quick single
nips back in from length outside off, Kohli lets it go
juicy half-volley and Kohli plays a stunning square drive. The intent was the key there. There was width and he opened the bat face at the last moment to hit it to the left of cover. So good to watch

after bowling full and wide, Lakmal cleverly floats this back in full from wide of the crease. This time Kohli looks to flick and has been saved by the thinnest of inside edges. Umpire Joel Wilson reverses his decision. Relief in the Indian camp, Eden Gardens roars. Kohli spontaneously went up for the review. Nothing else would've saved him there, but he looked confident.

once again, nice and full outside off, driven to sweeper cover. Gamage fires a poor throw to the keeper on the half-volley and they take an extra run off the overthrow as the midwicket fielder runs around to cover that

how much would you pay to watch shots like those? Wow, that is a scorcher. Full and just outside off, there's a hint of movement away as well but Kohli shows the full face of the bat and brings his wrists into play to gently ease this wide of the stumps rather than hitting it straight. Flew off the face of the bat. Joel Wilson may have nearly tripped over as he tried to avoid that
back of length delivery outside off, he lets it go
driven through the line to mid-off
gets a good stride forward and defends
whipped off his hip. deep square leg makes a right royal mess of that. Suranga Lakmal would've been hoping for a quiet sip of water but had to hare across nearly 20 yards. He tumbled over the ball
looks to belt this through cover but gets a thick inside edge onto the pad as the ball rolls to the leg side

wow, this is magnificent. The bottom-handed whip that VVS Laxman would be proud of. Most batsmen would look to drive this through cover but Kohli gets forward and across just a bit as he flicks this with an air of nonchalance through midwicket

races to the fine leg boundary. Plenty of deviation as this short ball angled in, Kohli looked to pull but missed it altogether. Dickwella can't stop it despite a full-length dive. Runs bleeding and India are motoring along here suddenly, with Kohli racing towards his century

nearly chopped it back onto the stumps. Bhuvi looks to get on top of the bounce and defend but the ball just bounced over. He was looking to take a single, perhaps because he wasn't sure where the ball went
caught on the hop as he defends this attempted bouncer towards his ribcage
wow, a backfoot punch right out of the top drawer. Nice, high elbow as he played that. Picked the length early, transferred the weight back and laced it away.
too full and angling into the pads, flicked into the gap between midwicket and mid-on. It's Herath who gently runs after that, enough time to come back for the second
sways out of the way of this short ball on middle, way too high
gentle leg-stump half-volley that has been flicked to deep midwicket
looks to slap this over mid-off, mistimed to the fielder on the bounce
banged in short outside off, Bhuvi looks to help this over short man through an upper cut, but can't reach out
looks to mow this over cow corner, blind swing at that incoming length ball. Beaten

clever bowling this. Bangs a short ball but this is well directed, towards Bhuvi's ribcage. The ball skids on so he's completely into a tangle and eventually fends to Dilruwan at gully. He was looking to flat-bat this over the bowler's head, perhaps gave away his intention too early
this length ball keeps a touch low, Shami shuffles across and defends this back down the pitch
gets a thick inside edge to square leg as he fends this short ball. Surprisingly, Kohli crosses over for a single
short and angling in from wide of the crease, Shami looks to help this towards fine leg but misses.
looks to take on the short ball but this bounced way over Shami's head as he looked to hook
dinks this into the leg side to get Kohli back on strike

nothing unorthodox about the stroke. Backs away, gets underneath the length of this full delivery and lofts this effortlessly inside-out over extra cover. Took a couple of steps down the pitch to manufacture the length
skids back in to deflect off a thin inside edge off the thigh pad towards backward point. The fielder in the deep had a lot of running in to catch up, by which time he was back for the second
looks to hook but this bouncer was way over his head, Lakmal is annoyed at the decision but it was a very simple one for the umpire
creams this full delivery to sweeper cover
steers this length ball down to square third man
floats this a touch ahead of length outside off, punched to deep point
steps out, makes room and carves this full delivery to sweeper cover, wanted the second but there's no way he would've made it in time
he's given this a proper whack. Fetches this pull from outside off and connects. One bounce to the deep midwicket boundary.
looks to take on the short ball again but this was bowled way outside off and he was through with it even before the ball arrived. Beaten
short and angling in, Shami is cramped for room but he swivels back and helps this into the deep backward square leg boundary. What presence of mind.
length ball outside off, Kohli dabs this down to third man
angles this down leg, misses a little tickle to fine leg. Good work by the keeper
chops this into the off side, wide of the keeper, as they scamper a single

gets to his 50th international century in grand style! Goes down on one knee and lets out a roar towards the dressing room. India have declared. Coming back to the shot, this was a length ball outside off, Kohli advances down the pitch and then slaps this with a horizontal bat over extra cover. Flat hit, but wow, that just flew off the blade. The emotions were in check for a split-second or two, but then came the roar. How he's accelerated since Saha's dismissal.
short of length outside off, Samarawickrama gets on top of the bounce and defends
excellent leave. Full and swinging away from outside off, he got into the position to drive before deciding he'd have nothing to do with the delivery
solidly defends this length ball outside off, not much deviation off the pitch this time
nicely forward as he defends this length ball into the off side.
big appeal for lbw, or was it for caught behind? Nothing on it. Cut Sadeera into half as this one nipped in to take the flap of the pad on the way through to Saha

played on! Oh, dear. That's a terrible start. 50th Test wicket for Bhuvneshwar Kumar. This is a short of length delivery outside off, Sadeera looks to punch this through cover but jabs at that with hard hands with an angled bat and only manages to chop this back onto the stumps.
gentle length ball that nips away off the seam from middle, tucked wide of midwicket
nah, nah nah. Digs in a short ball but this is way down leg, easily avoided
stands tall and punches this away-going length ball to point
leans forward and gently defends this into the gap at cover for an easy single
nice and full outside off, inviting the batsman to drive, but he's happy to let this go
floats this full on off from wide of the crease, defended
gets this length ball to nip away off the seam from around the fifth stump, left alone
dabs this gently to gully
beauty from around the stumps. Squared up as the ball rears up from length and zips past the outside edge. Superb
floats this much fuller, just nibbling away around the off stump, Dimuth is beaten as he pokes at the delivery
plays inside the line of this full delivery as he lets it go
solidly defends this incoming length ball back down the pitch
full but this is way outside off, Dimuth leaves
gets across the stumps and bunts this incoming length delivery towards midwicket

played on, again! Didn't need to play at that really, as it was a length ball outside off. Pushed with hard hands but was cramped for room and ended up dragging it back onto the stumps. What is happening?
sways out of the way of this bouncer outside off
floats this a touch ahead of length outside off, left alone
full outside off, plays from the crease when he may have been better off going forward. No damage done though
angles in a length ball on off stump from around the wicket, defended
excellent leave. This one came back in a long way off the seam from outside off
this one moves away but is pitched so far outside off that the batsman is happy to leave
shows the full face of the bat in defence to that full delivery
this is excellent from Bhuvi. Length but snakes this in to the stumps, hits the top part of Thirimanne's bat as he defends to the leg side
floats this much fuller on off stump, Thirimanne is solid in defence
helped to the fine leg boundary. Wrong line from Shami. Eden goes silent. Strays this onto the pads from wide of the crease, easy pickings.
skiddy length ball outside off, Mathews leaves
this one nipped back in and kept a touch low, rolls off an inside edge towards midwicket as they scamper a single
angles this full and just around middle and off, Thiri shuffles across a wee bit and then offers the full face of the bat in defence
shaped to leave but realised this short of length delivery was on target and zippy. The ball raps him on the finger. Gosh, the ball thudded into his fingers.
works this off his hip to fine leg.
works this length ball to midwicket
gets forward and defends this back to the bowler off the inner part of the bat
ducks under this short ball without a trace of worry
length ball angling across the left-hander, watched through to Saha
confident forward defence to this length ball angling in from around the wicket
gets a nice stride forward as he bunts this full delivery to the off side.
back of a length on a fourth stump line - took a while for him to get there in the first innings - Mathews defends
digs it into the deck and it responds, forcing Mathews to leap up off his toes to fend a ball off his face to point
attacks the body again and Mathews, pulling his bottom hand off the handle, turns it through midwicket. Excellent line again
gets right behind a short ball on off stump. The pace is back up at 138 kph.
too full, too wide, too easy. There are these occasions when Umesh looks rather ordinary. This half-volley that is cover-driven handsomely by Thirimanne can be stuck somewhere in there
gets off his toes to block a shortish delivery on and around off stump

taken at gully! Rahane's the man. And Sri Lanka lose another batsman to ball he needn't have played. Credit though to the bowler who goes around the wicket, creating an angle into the left-hander and making him feel as if he needs to present bat to the good length ball. All it needs to do then is hold its line a little bit - and considering it is new and it has been sent down by the masterful Bhuvi, that's a given
squares him up! Lovely bowling, in line with off stump, the angle from over the wicket bringing the ball in, a little bit of seam away putting Chandimal in trouble
presses forward to defend a fuller delivery on off stump
on the pads and Chandimal clips it to deep square leg
hangs back and blocks a shortish delivery on middle
fullish and outside off - the kind of delivery that took Thirimanne's edge - the captain though shoulders arms
back of a length and outside off, Mathews shuffles across and then leaves well
he's starting to judge the line a lot better now. A few minutes at the crease, that's all a class batsman needs. And of course help from the bowler who pitches it a tad too short
back of a length and outside off, Mathews decides to push it into the covers
fuller delivery on off stump, Mathews gets in the way of its date with the stumps.
brilliant bowling. He hits a crack in line with off stump and the ball darts away from Mathews, who gets squared up as he defends with soft hands.
looking for the glory ball that pitches leg and hits off, all he gets for that effort is a whip to long leg
angles it towards the top of off stump, works it to short midwicket
soft hands, angled bat, Mathews searches for a single but his partner is not too keen. India doing very well in the field
waits on the short ball to come near him and then deftly flicks it to long leg. Good batting.
gets forward to block a good length ball outside off. Middles it well
back of a length and outside off, Chandimal is forced to square himself up to deal with the seam movement away
shortish and outside off, Chandimal punches to mid-off
nudges a back of a length delivery on off stump to mid-on
a straight bat face, a sound decision to play late and close to the body. Mathews absorbing all the pressure. But Umesh needs to pitch it up more
that's good. If he wants to go short, he should bang it in like that. The line is on off stump and it forces Mathews to drop his wrist and fold his torso back away from the line
short, wide, cracked in front of point. He does have a habit of giving boundary balls. The count is at two now

huge appeal for lbw as Umesh skids off the pitch and pins Mathews on the knee roll. Umpire Llong says no and so Kohli reviews. This is Umesh's specialty when he hits a fuller length. The ball seems to gather pace and catches the batsman on the move. Mathews is only halfway into his flick shot. He's struck low enough, he's stuck in line, and HawkEye says it will go on to hit leg stump. India on a rooooolllll!
digs it in short on middle stump, and Dickwella shuffles right across so that he can get outside the line
back of a length and outside off, Chandimal pushes away from his body for a push through point
fuller delivery outside off, Chandimal does well not to be sucked in
defends a fuller delivery on off stump
gets in line with a fullish delivery on off stump
bouncer on middle and leg, Chandimal gets under it
blocks a short of a good length ball on off stump. Bhuvi completes his fifth maiden in six overs
another excellent bouncer, right over middle and off stump and the batsman does well to avoid it
another bouncer - climbing past the left shoulder and Dickwella just about gets out of the way.
short and down leg, Dickwella doesn't need to spend too much energy with that
goes back to block a short delivery on off stump. And then practices a pull shot, as Kohli did earlier in the day
lovely work. He drops the ball in front of cover, and even with Jadeja being so swift, he can't get to it in time to stop the quick single
fuller delivery outside off takes the edge through to the third man boundary. Soft hands, angled bat and just enough seam movement away combine to spirit the ball past a packed cordon
over long leg! Goes after the short ball, climbing up on his throat, but the good thing Dickwella does is keep his eyes on it, swivels on his back foot and sends it soaring
back of a length on off stump, defends

what the weird shots! He's basically skipped across outside off, and ends up behind the stumps when he scoops the ball away over the backward square leg boundary. And it appears Dickwella plays it only after he noted there were three fielders behind square on the leg side. He knows that will mean a no-ball - which began on a good length outside off and ended up in exactly the strangest place possible
full and outside off, defends
good length ball on middle and leg, defends
short ball on middle, nudges it through midwicket
bouncer on middle and leg, Chandimal gets under it
flicks the short ball off his hips to deep square leg
flicks a shortish delivery off his pads through square leg
full and curling into middle and leg. Chandimal, by virtue of staying still and playing late, flicks the ball handsomely through midwicket
beautiful work from Chandimal, shuffling across to clip a short ball on middle and leg to the long leg boundary. Shami, the fielder, tries to put a boot on the ball but isn't able to.
defends a shortish delivery to the right of gully.
fullish on middle and leg, works it to long leg
turns a fullish delivery to the right of midwicket.
offcutter, he picks it early and blocks it calmly. Dickwella's fun even when he plays the most orthodox of shots
he has three slips and a gully to watch out for but he still guides the short ball to the third man boundary like a boss. Extra bounce and lack of room be damned
fuller delivery outside off, lets it go
whips a short ball from around the wicket through to deep midwicket
juicy full toss outside off, blocks it. If ever there was an indication that Sri Lanka aren't looking for runs...
back of a length on off stump, chops down on it with an angled face
fullish and outside off from around the wicket, Dickwella drives to cover
drags a short ball from outside off to deep square leg with a well-controlled pull
peach of a ball! The seam comes down, pointing into the batsman, but it's wobbling as well. So when it hits the deck, it ends up holding its line and beaten Chandimal's block off the front foot
he's forced into a shot by the late movement into the right-hander. Back of a length, snarling into him, and Chandimal slices it to the cordon
makes the ball deck away off the pitch this time and Chandimal's prod sends it past the three-man cordon. Right, that's one hour done after tea.
bouncer from around the wicket, Dickwella doesn't need to play at those
outside edge which bounces short of first slip. But who cares about that. Shami walks right up to the batsman in his followthrough and gives the batsman a piece of his mind
shortish on off stump, defends
back of a length and outside off, lets it go
lets go a short of a good length delivery outside off. Good judgment. The gamesmanship has not affected him. If anything, he's more focused
goes over the wicket for a fuller delivery outside off and pushes to cover
tosses it up so much that it is a low full toss. Chandimal defends
brings a straight bat down on a fast dipping delivery on leg stump
fuller delivery outside off, he squeezes it through point
fuller delivery outside off, drives through to the sweeper
whippy drive through cover! He stands very still at the crease, allowing the tossed up delivery to come into his yard and then smashes it through the gap
drives a tossed up delivery outside off to cover
fuller delivery outside off, lets it go

The noise of bat hitting pad gets Shami excited and they go for the review. Regardless of the third umpire's decision, this is just fast bowling nirvana. A short ball angled into the right-hander hits the pitch and hustles through. Chandimal is originally doesn't want to play but is pressed to do so.No bat says Anil Chaudhary as it goes through to the wicketkeeper.
good length outside off, turns it through midwicket

through him! Chandimal hangs back to a full delivery and is thrown off balance as he tries to negotiate it. The ball zips through bat and pad and crashes into the stumps, very much like how Rahul was cleaned up earlier in the day.

Dickwella played outside the line as this full delivery veered in, got a thin inside edge through to Saha, who came up with an excellent effort.

this is a ripper of a delivery. The leg stump talks a royal walk. Sri Lanka lose their seventh. The look of disbelief on their faces tell you a story. This is angled in full from wide of the crease, pitches and jags away just a wee bit to beat Dilruwan's tentative push to cannon into the top of off. As a captain, you can't ask for a better delivery than that from your fast bowler. Sensational
